course.title: Cultural Agents
course.meeting_text: M., 3-5, and a weekly section to be arranged.
course.faculty_text: Doris Sommer (Romance Languages and Literatures; African and African American Studies) and Francesco Erspamer (Romance Languages and Literatures)
course.description: Explore the arts as social and professional resources! Whether you pursue medicine, law, engineering, business, government, etc., the arts will enhance your work and your citizenship. Active citizens construct opportunities for positive social change. A lecture series by a range of professionals demonstrates that change in practically any field depends on art. Theoretical readings (Schiller, Kant, Dewey, Freire, Gramsci, Ranciere, Mockus, Boal, Nussbaum, Pasolini, inter alia) are grounded in concrete cases of agency. The final project will be a design for a creative social intervention, including reflections on creating the design.
